website_summaries.verdict: Sperry releases a boot where function and fashion meet to make the feet happy. Make a statement with your outfit, even on the rainy days. While this boot is best for the wet season, it is versatile enough to enjoy it even in dry conditions.
pros: There is a consensus among the wearers of the Sperry Huntington Duck Boot that it is stylish and versatile
According to most of the users, this boot is effective in keeping the feet warm and dry
A number of reviewers find the shoe comfortable to wear
The Huntington Duck Boot has excellent traction, according to a large percentage of buyers
Several mentions that this Sperry shoe is an excellent product at a fair price
A couple of purchasers find this boot lightweight
Many love the Sperry Huntington Duck Boot colorways so much to the point that they purchase more than one color
cons: One customer with a high arch finds this boot a little bit flat
According to some, the Huntington Duck Boot is challenging to put on and off
A couple of buyers are unhappy with the thin soles of this sneaker because they can feel even the small rock when they step on it

customer_reviews.title: Good casual rain boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice for rainy days of wet ground. The bottom of the shoe is not a lug type sole, it has lighter ridges. Functional and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Look used and fake!
customer_reviews.text: Completely scratched up, DONT feel like real Sperrys, have a tag that was cut off and still showing! Definitely returning!
customer_reviews.author: jrs

customer_reviews.title: Ankle biters
customer_reviews.text: These boots are made with rubbish material. Didn't insulate my feet and the least of the problems I encountered. The area where the rubber meets fabric extends into your ankle region. The non-stop rubbing against your skin (even through wool socks) will draw blood. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Moore

customer_reviews.title: Poor leather condition
customer_reviews.text: Poor leather condition as you can see from photos. Only took pictures of one boot as other was not as bad but still had some blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis hartselle

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Not very warm or padded. Basically walking on the rubber sole. Not a great all around shoe but fine for letting the dog out.
customer_reviews.author: howard f

customer_reviews.title: Order .5 or a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9.5 and these are a little big on me. I would suggest ordering a half size smaller than your usual size. Still a great boot though.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Akins

customer_reviews.title: Fits to size and looks stylish.
customer_reviews.text: It’s on the ball for sizing. I thought almost too small but no. It’s legit perfect to any other size you get with sperry. Looks great and functions well. Keeps feet pretty warm too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Good boot for price
customer_reviews.text: Sick I'll boot if you get the lingo... Very comfortable and accurate description... Only for the classy ...
customer_reviews.author: JUDAH RISING

customer_reviews.title: Product not satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied, the eyelets have already come out where lace 2nd from bottom with minimum!! Not expected at all. Will not order another pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Milliner

customer_reviews.title: I’ll fitting and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for winter use but very little padding and insulation. You could feel the ground through the bottom. Very disappointed for shoes that cost over $100.00
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Estes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged beyond belief, and the boots were scuffed up and scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Probably get a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I have some sperry top sider boat shoes and duck boots. And these are a little snugger. I’d personally go a half size bigger with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, able to withstand rain and snow with ease.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and needed: a comfortable boot to keep my feet dry in the wet Pacific Northwest, but fashion enough I can wear them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Double-You

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sperry offers several different styles but this is just uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fall must
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfect. Love the style, color, fit, and they were such a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots but....
customer_reviews.text: Leather part of boots were scratched. However, fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha G.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boot
customer_reviews.text: Looks very very good. Fits great but you need to wear some thick socks
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stutes

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved them! Wore them in Colorado and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Arden

customer_reviews.title: High quality, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this boot the leather is very nice and thick. They are warm. If you have ever warn vans the size ratio is pretty much the same. They are a smaller boot but it’s nice because I wear skinny jeans so they fit very well. Very fashionable!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler coco

product_meta.title: Sperry mens Huntington Duck Boot
feature_bullets: Non-marking, rubber outsole with Wave-Siping for traction
